commands.example: Enable tank to actively collect gas
Automatically refill gas bottles in tank inventory
Manually refill bottles in tank inventory

setup: Monitor tank fill levels with Event Controller
Use Stockpile mode to collect gas
Place empty bottles in tank inventory
Bottles automatically fill from tank storage

validation_rules: Small grid Small Oxygen Tank: 3,000L capacity
Large grid Small Oxygen Tank: 100,000L capacity
Hydrogen tanks have much larger capacities
Stockpile ON: tank actively collects gas, stops providing
Stockpile OFF: tank provides gas, stops collecting
All tanks can hold up to 7 gas bottles

common_failures.cause: All oxygen tanks on Stockpile mode
common_failures.solution: Disable Stockpile on at least one oxygen tank

common_failures.cause: Stockpile disabled or no gas source
common_failures.solution: Enable Stockpile and check gas generator/source
Enable Auto-Refill and ensure tank has gas

commands.example: Hold F key while facing inner terminal to heal/recharge
Press F at booth area to customize appearance
Name respawn point for easy identification

setup: Connect medical room to gas supply via conveyors
Provides healing, energy recharge, and gas refill
Build medical rooms at strategic locations
Set unique Spawn Names for identification
Configure faction sharing for team respawns

validation_rules: Large grid only - no small grid variant
Provides respawn point for owner and faction members
Refills suit oxygen/hydrogen if conveyored to gas supply
Does NOT refill gas bottles in inventory
Suit customization booth allows appearance changes

common_failures.error: Medical room not available for respawn
common_failures.cause: No power or not owned/shared properly
common_failures.solution: Check power supply and ownership/faction settings

common_failures.cause: Not connected to gas supply via conveyors
common_failures.solution: Connect medical room to conveyor system with gas tanks
Use booth area (right side), not the healing terminal
